posts.title:
We asked Hong Kongâ€™s digital leaders what keeps them up at night. 
The answer wasn't "More Traffic."...
posts.description:
We asked Hong Kongâ€™s digital leaders what keeps them up at night. 
The answer wasn't "More Traffic." It was "AI Visibility."

Just wrapped up an incredible executive session with Amplitude.

The energy in the room was electric, but the post-event data tells the real story. 
We surveyed our guestsâ€”leaders from Finance, Retail, and Techâ€”on their #1 priority for 2026.

The overwhelming winner? Generative Engine Optimization (GEO).

The realization is hitting hard: 
âŒ Ranking #1 on Google doesn't matter if ChatGPT answers the user's question without a click. 
âœ… The new battleground is ensuring your brand is "visible" and "recommended" by AI agents.

A huge thank you to everyone who joined the conversation. 
The shift from "Search" to "Answer" is here, and today proved that Hong Kong's top enterprises are ready to tackle it.

Missed the session? We are opening up 5 more slots for the Custom AI Visibility Audit (the same one our guests received).

Comment "VISIBILITY" below, and Iâ€™ll DM you the details.

James B. Lindsay Baljin S. Amelia Xu Ai Nico Ng

posts.title: Yesterday's Google Workspace x JumpCloud event was pure synergy! ğŸš€ We dove deep into building a more...
posts.description:
Yesterday's Google Workspace x JumpCloud event was pure synergy! ğŸš€ We dove deep into building a more productive and secure solution for today's hybrid workforce.

We learned that boosting efficiency with integrated AI like Gemini in Workspace doesn't mean sacrificing security.ğŸ›¡ï¸ Google Workspace Security together with JumpCloud is a powerful pairing to secure your enterprise data and centralize identity and device controls for everything, ensuring uncompromised protection against threats like data leakage and compromised credentials.

A huge shout-out to our incredible speakers for sharing their expertise and demos: Nicholas Effendi, Jeremy N., and Jovi Lee. ğŸ¤

Also big thanks to the wonderful support from the teams from Google Linsey Linh Dang Anisha Rakyan and JumpCloud Ivan Chin Gautham Anbalagan. ğŸ™Œ

Last but not least, thank you to all the attendees for making it such a vibrant and insightful event!

posts.title:
The "Zero-Click" era is here. Is your SEO strategy fighting the wrong war?

Itâ€™s the nightmare scena...
posts.description:
The "Zero-Click" era is here. Is your SEO strategy fighting the wrong war?

Itâ€™s the nightmare scenario for every digital leader: You rank #1 on Google, but your traffic is flat. Why? 
Because the user never clicked. They got their answer from an AI summary and moved on.

The data confirms the shift: 
ğŸ“‰ Zero-click searches are skyrocketing. 
ğŸ“‰ CTRs are plummeting as AI overviews take over. 
ğŸ“‰ 80% of consumers (Bain & Co) no longer rely solely on traditional search to learn about brands.

If a potential client asks ChatGPT or Claude about your solution, do you know what it says? Is it recommending you? Or your competitor?

Until now, this was a blind spot. Not anymore.

Join us on Dec 3 for an exclusive executive luncheon with Amplitude. 
We are unveiling the new AI Visibility frameworkâ€”the first tool designed to measure your standing in the age of LLMs.

Exclusive for attendees: We will be generating a Custom AI Visibility Report for your brand, showing you exactly how you rank in AI-generated answers today.

Stop guessing. Start measuring.

ğŸ‘‰ Request your seat here (Private Dining): https://hubs.la/Q03W0WdJ0
Event details in comment.

posts.description:
ğŸ‰ Announcing the AI Agents Lab Tour! Shanghai, Hong Kong, Beijing & Taipei.

The age of AI Agents is here, and we're bringing the revolution to you!

Master Concept and Google Cloud are launching the "Build your AI Agents" Lab across four cities. This is your chance to move beyond theory and get hands-on experience building intelligent agents that automate workflows and execute complex decisions.

Find your city and register below:

ğŸ“ Shanghai | Oct 28 Register Here: https://hubs.la/Q03PrbBV0

ğŸ“ Hong Kong | Oct 30 Register Here: https://hubs.la/Q03PrbpM0

ğŸ“ Beijing | Nov 19 Save the date! Registration opens soon.

ğŸ“ Taipei | Nov 28 Register Here: https://lnkd.in/eK6rrPc3

This is a BYOL (Bring Your Own Laptop) event, so prepare to dive in and explore the infinite possibilities of AI Agents.
